model.name: Security REST VOs
model.description: Security Value Objects used in REST API

class.name: PlexusRoleResource
class.description: Details of a security role. A roles uniqueness is made up of an id and a source (where the role came from).

field.name: source
field.description: The source id of the role. Defines what source the role came from.

class.name: RoleListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a role list request.

class.name: RoleResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for role request.

class.name: RoleResourceRequest
class.description: REST Request object to persist a role

class.name: RoleResource
class.description: Role configuration.

field.name: sessionTimeout
field.description: The sessionTimeout of the role (legacy, actual value not used).

field.name: roles
field.description: List of role id's contained by this role.

field.name: privileges
field.description: List of privilege id's contained by this role.

field.name: userManaged
field.description: Flag that defines if a user can update this role (read-only).

class.name: ExternalRoleMappingResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object to list role mappings. A role mapping maps roles of one security realm to the default one.

class.name: ExternalRoleMappingListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object to list role mappings. A role mapping maps roles of one security realm to the default one.

class.name: ExternalRoleMappingResource
class.description: A role mapping maps roles of one security realm to the default one.

class.name: PlexusRoleListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object that lists roles.

class.name: UserListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object that lists users.

class.name: UserResourceResponse
class.description: REST response object containing a user.

class.name: UserResourceRequest
class.description: REST request object to persist a user.

class.name: UserForgotPasswordRequest
class.description: REST Request to reset a user's password.

field.name: data
field.description: Details needed to reset a users's password.

class.name: UserChangePasswordRequest
class.description: REST Request to change a user's password.

field.name: data
field.description: Details needed to change a users's password.

class.name: UserResource
class.description: User's details.

field.name: password
field.description: The password of the user (write only).

field.name: firstName
field.description: The first name of the user.

field.name: lastName
field.description: The last name of the user.

field.name: status
field.description: The status of the user. Available status: active, locked, disabled.

field.name: email
field.description: The email address of the user.

class.name: UserForgotPasswordResource
class.description: Details needed to reset a users's password.

class.name: UserChangePasswordResource
class.description: Details needed to change a users's password.

class.name: PlexusUserListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object that lists users.

class.name: PlexusUserResourceResponse
class.description: REST response object containing a user.

class.name: PlexusUserResource
class.description: User's details.

field.name: source
field.description: The source of the role, i.e. what realm the user belongs to.

field.name: firstName
field.description: The first name of the user.

field.name: lastName
field.description: The last name of the user.

field.name: email
field.description: The email address of the user.

class.name: PlexusUserSearchCriteriaResourceRequest
class.description: REST Request object to search for users based on criteria.

class.name: PlexusUserSearchCriteriaResource
class.description: User search criteria details.

field.name: userId
field.description: Partial user Id to search for. Uses 'starts with' search. So 'jcod' will match 'jcoder' but not 'cjcoder'.

field.name: effectiveUsers
field.description: An effective user is one that can login to the system.

class.name: UserToRoleResourceRequest
class.description: REST Request object to assign a roles to a user. Typically used when assigning roles to a user NOT managed by this system.

class.name: UserToRoleResource
class.description: Details to assign roles to a users.

field.name: roles
field.description: The list of roles to assign to the user. This list will replace the roles the user currently has.

class.name: PlexusComponentListResource
class.description: Details of a component used by the system.

class.name: PrivilegeListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object to list privileges.

class.name: PrivilegeStatusResourceResponse
class.description: REST response object containing a privilege.

class.name: PrivilegeStatusResource
class.description: Privilege details.

field.name: userManaged
field.description: Flag that defines if a privilege can update this role (read-only).

field.name: properties
field.description: List of properties for this privilege.

class.name: PrivilegeProperty
class.description: Key value pair.

class.name: PrivilegeTypeResourceResponse
class.description: REST Request object to lists the types of privilege in the system.

class.name: PrivilegeTypeResource
class.description: Privilege type details. Used to dynamically define types of privileges.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the privilege type.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the privilege type.

field.name: properties
field.description: List of properties used to create privileges.

class.name: PrivilegeTypePropertyResource
class.description: Privilege property details.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the privilege property.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the privilege property.

field.name: helpText
field.description: The help text of the privilege property.

field.name: type
field.description: The type of the privilege property.

class.name: AuthenticationLoginResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object to list the privileges a users has.

class.name: AuthenticationLoginResource
class.description: Wrapper around login details.

class.name: AuthenticationClientPermissions
class.description: Login details info.

field.name: loggedIn
field.description: Flags if a user is logged in.

class.name: ClientPermission
class.description: Permission details.

field.name: value
field.description: Privilege value: NONE = 0, READ = 1, UPDATE = 2, DELETE = 4, CREATE = 8, or you can OR them together.

class.name: PlexusComponentListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object to list components.

class.name: RoleAndPrivilegeListResource
class.description: A paginated list of roles and privileges. Sorted alphabetically with roles listed before privileges

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the role or privilege.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the role or privilege.

field.name: description
field.description: The description of the role or privilege.

field.name: external
field.description: Flag that, if true, states this role is external (not from default security realm).

class.name: RoleAndPrivilegeListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object to list roles and privileges using pagination.

field.name: totalCount
field.description: Total count of roles and privileges in the system

class.name: RoleAndPrivilegeListFilterResource
class.description: A filter object, that will filter the results of the request

field.name: name
field.description: Filter to be applied to the name of the results.

field.name: noPrivileges
field.description: If true, privileges will be left out of results.

field.name: noRoles
field.description: If true, roles will be left out of results.

field.name: onlySelected
field.description: If true, only selected results will be returned.

field.name: noExternalRoles
field.description: If true, external roles will be left out of results.

field.name: selectedRoleIds
field.description: List of roleIds that should be included in response (after applying other filters of course).

field.name: selectedPrivilegeIds
field.description: List of privilegeIds that should be included in response (after applying other filters of course).

field.name: hiddenRoleIds
field.description: List of roleIds that should be hidden from response.

field.name: hiddenPrivilegeIds
field.description: List of privilegeIds that should be hidden from response.

field.name: userId
field.description: If defined, results returned will also contain any roles that are from external sources assigned to this user.

class.name: RoleAndPrivilegeListFilterResourceRequest
class.description: REST Request object to filter the list roles and privileges using pagination.

class.name: AssignedPrivilegeListResource
class.description: A privilege object, that contains details about the privilege, as well as a tree showing how this privilege is assigned to the user through roles.

field.name: parents
field.description: Set of parents of this privilege.

class.name: ParentNode
class.description: A parent of a role or privilege.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the privilege or role.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the privilege or role.

field.name: parents
field.description: Set of parents of this privilege or role.

class.name: AssignedPrivilegeListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object retrieve list of privileges assigned to a user.

class.name: RoleTreeResource
class.description: A node in a users tree of roles.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the privilege or role.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the privilege or role.

field.name: type
field.description: The type of the item, privilege or role

field.name: children
field.description: Set of roles/privileges assigned to this user/role.

class.name: RoleTreeResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object retrieve the tree of roles/privs assigned to a user.

field.name: data
field.description: The list of roles assigned to this user (each having its own list of roles/privileges assigned to it).
